1.title: Shiny Trinket
1.description: A shiny button lies on the ground next to some small bones. Something collects treasures here.

1.title: Moving Shadow
1.description: A shadow on the wall moves wrong - reaching toward you when the light source doesn't shift. You blink and it's normal again.

1.title: Rusted Sword Fragment
1.description: A broken sword blade, ancient and rusted. The pommel has a symbol you don't recognize. Old soldiers were here once.

1.title: Painful Carving
1.description: A small carving on the wall. Looking at it makes your eyes water and your head throb. You look away quickly.

1.title: Salt-Crusted Stone
1.description: The stones here are crusted with salt. You can hear waves in the distance. Still near the surface.

1.title: Slime Trail
1.description: A thick slime trail crosses the floor - something huge and segmented. The smell makes you gag.

1.title: Crumbling Edge
1.description: The floor edge crumbles under your foot. Pebbles fall into darkness. You don't hear them hit bottom.

1.title: Rat Skeleton
1.description: A rat skeleton picked completely clean. Tiny teeth marks on the bones.

1.title: Broken Spear
1.description: A spear shaft snapped in half. The break is old but the wood is oddly preserved.

1.title: Scratched Warning
1.description: Words scratched into stone: 'Turn back.' The letters are crude, desperate.

1.title: Colorful Pebble
1.description: A smooth, colorful pebble sits in an otherwise empty alcove. Placed there deliberately.

1.title: Rusty Helmet
1.description: A dented helmet, rust-red and ancient. It's been polished recently on one side.

1.title: Fog Tendril
1.description: A tendril of fog curls through a crack in the ceiling. It moves against the wind.

1.title: Distant Chittering
1.description: High-pitched chittering echoes from somewhere. It stops when you try to locate it.

1.title: Gnawed Rope
1.description: A rope end, gnawed through by small teeth. Whatever was tied here escaped.

1.title: Lighthouse Pulse
1.description: The walls pulse with faint light for just a moment. Like a heartbeat.

1.title: Seabird Feather
1.description: A seabird feather, out of place this deep. How did it get here?

1.title: Tiny Footprints
1.description: Tiny footprints in the dust. Barefoot. Child-sized but wrong somehow.

1.title: Broken Bottle
1.description: Shards of a bottle. The glass is thick, old. It once held something alcoholic.

1.title: Scorch Mark
1.description: A small scorch mark on the wall. Recent. Something burned here.

1.title: Dropped Coin
1.description: A single copper coin, green with age. The face is worn smooth.

1.title: Nest Material
1.description: Bits of cloth and straw arranged like nest material. Empty now.

1.title: Carved Tally
1.description: Tally marks carved into stone. Someone counted something here. Hundreds of marks.

1.title: Bent Nail
1.description: A bent iron nail on the ground. It's been straightened and bent again multiple times.

1.title: Mushroom Cluster
1.description: A small cluster of pale mushrooms growing from a crack. They glow faintly.

1.title: Tooth
1.description: A single tooth, sharp and yellowed. Too large to be human.

1.title: Frayed Banner
1.description: A scrap of banner fabric, faded beyond recognition. Once it was red.

1.title: Candle Stub
1.description: A candle burned down to nothing. The wax is old but not ancient.

1.title: Claw Scratch
1.description: A single claw scratch on the wall. Deep. Whatever made it was strong.

1.title: Dropped Ration
1.description: A piece of hardtack, moldy and old. Someone dropped their rations here.

1.title: Broken Chain Link
1.description: A single link from a chain. The metal is pitted with rust.

1.title: Pebble Pile
1.description: A small pile of pebbles stacked carefully. A cairn? A marker?

1.title: Bat Guano
1.description: Fresh bat droppings. You hear wings fluttering somewhere above.

1.title: Wet Stone
1.description: The stone here is damp. Water seeps from somewhere. You hear dripping.

1.title: Snapped Arrow
1.description: An arrow shaft snapped in two. The fletching is rotted away.

1.title: Chalk Mark
1.description: A chalk mark on the wall - an X. Someone marked this spot.

1.title: Loose Stone
1.description: A stone wobbles under your foot. Beneath it, a small hollow. Empty.

1.title: Bone Whistle
1.description: A small whistle carved from bone. It makes no sound when you blow it.

1.title: Singed Hair
1.description: A tuft of singed hair caught on a stone. It smells of burning.

1.title: Dropped Key
1.description: A small key, rusted solid. It won't turn anything now.

1.title: Bloodstain
1.description: A dark stain on the floor. Old blood. A lot of it.

1.title: Prayer Beads
1.description: A single prayer bead on a broken string. The symbol is unfamiliar.

1.title: Cracked Lens
1.description: A cracked glass lens from spectacles. Someone lost their sight here.

1.title: Rope Burn
1.description: A groove worn into stone by rope friction. Something heavy was lowered here.

1.title: Insect Husk
1.description: The dried husk of a large insect. Bigger than your hand.

1.title: Melted Wax
1.description: Wax melted and pooled on the floor. Multiple colors. Many candles burned here.

1.title: Torn Page
1.description: A page torn from a book. The text is in a language you don't recognize.

1.title: Buckle
1.description: A belt buckle, tarnished but intact. The leather is long gone.

1.title: Fish Bones
1.description: Tiny fish bones in a pile. Someone ate here. Recently.

1.title: Soot Smudge
1.description: A smudge of soot on the wall at hand height. Someone touched it with dirty hands.

2.title: Claw Marks
2.description: Fresh claw marks on the doorframe. Something with claws lives here and marks its territory.

2.title: Soggy Paper Scrap
2.description: A scrap of paper, barely readable: '...the screams from below...' The rest is water-damaged beyond recognition.

2.title: Scorch Mark
2.description: A scorch mark on the floor in the shape of a clawed foot. Whatever stood here was very hot.

2.title: Child's Toy
2.description: A small wooden toy horse, rotted and broken. Children lived here once.

2.title: Bone Pattern
2.description: Small bones arranged in a careful pattern on the floor. Fresh. Someone was here recently.

2.title: Double Echo
2.description: Your footstep echoes twice. The second echo comes a heartbeat too late.

2.title: Rotted Bedding
2.description: Scraps of rotted fabric - once a mattress or blanket. People slept here.

2.title: Bent Spoon
2.description: A bent eating spoon, tarnished black. Someone ate meals here long ago.

2.title: Red Ochre Smear
2.description: A smear of red ochre on the doorframe. Deliberate. A ward? A warning?

2.title: Broken Comb
2.description: A wooden comb with half its teeth broken off. Personal grooming, centuries ago.

2.title: Mold Patch
2.description: A patch of black mold spreading across the wall. The smell is overwhelming.

2.title: Scratched Name
2.description: A name scratched into the wall: 'Marta.' Nothing else.

2.title: Dropped Needle
2.description: A sewing needle, rusted but intact. Someone mended clothes here.

2.title: Crushed Rat
2.description: A rat crushed flat against the wall. The impact was tremendous.

2.title: Servant's Bell
2.description: A small bell on a broken cord. It still rings faintly when touched.

2.title: Spilled Ink
2.description: An old ink stain on the floor. Someone wrote letters here.

2.title: Broken Mirror
2.description: Shards of a small hand mirror. The silver backing is tarnished black.

2.title: Gnawed Bone
2.description: A bone gnawed clean. The teeth marks are humanoid but wrong.

2.title: Dropped Thimble
2.description: A brass thimble rolled into a corner. Seamstress work.

2.title: Charcoal Sketch
2.description: A crude sketch on the wall in charcoal. A face. Sad eyes.

2.title: Broken Pottery
2.description: Shards of a clay pot. It once held water or food.

2.title: Loose Floorboard
2.description: A floorboard that creaks loudly. Beneath it, a small hollow. Empty now.

2.title: Candle Wax Trail
2.description: A trail of wax drips leading down the hall. Someone carried a candle this way.

2.title: Torn Apron
2.description: A scrap of apron fabric. Stained with old food and grease.

2.title: Wooden Button
2.description: A button carved from wood. Simple, functional. From a servant's shirt.

2.title: Rat Nest
2.description: A rat's nest made of shredded fabric and paper. Occupied.

2.title: Footprint in Dust
2.description: A single footprint in thick dust. Bare. Humanoid. Recent.

2.title: Broken Broom
2.description: A broom with its bristles worn to nubs. Someone swept here for years.

2.title: Spilled Grain
2.description: Ancient grain spilled and petrified on the floor. Once this was a pantry.

2.title: Hanging Cobweb
2.description: A massive cobweb hangs from the ceiling. Something large made this.

2.title: Scratched Map
2.description: A crude map scratched into the wall. It shows these rooms. An escape route?

2.title: Dropped Ladle
2.description: A wooden ladle, cracked and dry. Kitchen work.

2.title: Prayer Scratched
2.description: A prayer scratched into stone: 'Gods protect us.' It didn't work.

2.title: Broken Lantern
2.description: A lantern smashed on the floor. The oil stain is still visible.

2.title: Servant's Shoe
2.description: A single worn shoe. The sole is paper-thin from use.

2.title: Knot of Hair
2.description: A knot of human hair caught on a nail. Brown, long. A woman's.

2.title: Tally of Days
2.description: Tally marks counting days. They stop at 127.

2.title: Broken Cup
2.description: A clay cup broken in half. Cheap, utilitarian. A servant's cup.

2.title: Mop Bucket
2.description: A wooden bucket, warped and cracked. It once held mop water.

2.title: Dropped Coin Purse
2.description: An empty coin purse, the leather rotted. Someone lost their wages.

2.title: Scratched Symbol
2.description: A protective symbol scratched into the doorframe. It didn't protect them.

2.title: Broken Plate
2.description: Shards of a wooden plate. Simple, plain. Servants ate from these.

2.title: Dropped Scissors
2.description: Sewing scissors, rusted shut. Someone did needlework here.

2.title: Straw Mattress
2.description: The remains of a straw mattress, rotted to nothing. Someone slept here.

2.title: Broken Stool
2.description: A three-legged stool with one leg broken off. Someone sat here to work.

2.title: Spilled Soap
2.description: A lump of ancient soap, cracked and dry. Laundry was done here.

2.title: Dropped Rag
2.description: A cleaning rag, stiff with age and grime. Endless cleaning.

2.title: Broken Bucket
2.description: A bucket with its bottom rotted out. It carried water once.

2.title: Scratched Plea
2.description: 'Let me go home' scratched into the wall. They never did.

2.title: Dropped Spoon
2.description: A spoon bent nearly in half. Someone was very strong. Or very angry.

3.title: Quill Scratching
3.description: You hear a quill scratching on parchment from somewhere nearby. Constant. Methodical. Never stopping.

3.title: Chunk of Flesh
3.description: A chunk of rotting flesh on the floor. Bite marks on it. Someone's eating their own collection.

3.title: Forbidden Title
3.description: A book spine catches your eye. The title makes your head hurt to read. You look away.

3.title: Tattooing Needle
3.description: A tattooing needle on a table, still wet with ink. And blood. Fresh.

3.title: Whispering Pages
3.description: A book lies open. The pages whisper when you're not looking at them. You slam it shut.

3.title: Glass Shards
3.description: Fresh glass shards on the floor. Something was displayed here. Recently taken.

3.title: Clutched Portrait
3.description: A skeleton's bony fingers still clutch a small portrait. Even in death, they wouldn't let go.

3.title: Bookworm Trail
3.description: A trail of book dust and tiny holes. Something eats the pages here.

3.title: Ink Stain
3.description: A massive ink stain on the floor. A whole bottle spilled. Or thrown.

3.title: Torn Binding
3.description: A book binding torn apart. The pages are gone. Someone wanted what was inside.

3.title: Reading Glasses
3.description: Spectacles with one lens cracked. Left on a table as if the reader just stepped away.

3.title: Bookmark
3.description: A silk bookmark in a book. The page it marks is about summoning.

3.title: Candle Ring
3.description: A ring of candle stubs around a reading desk. Someone studied here for hours.

3.title: Chewed Page
3.description: A page chewed and spat out. The teeth marks are humanoid.

3.title: Dropped Quill
3.description: A quill pen, the nib broken. Someone pressed too hard while writing.

3.title: Book Stack
3.description: Books stacked in a precise tower. Someone organized these. Recently.

3.title: Dusty Shelf
3.description: One shelf is dust-free. Books are taken from here regularly.

3.title: Torn Map
3.description: A map torn from a book. It shows a city. Absalom.

3.title: Bloodstained Page
3.description: A page with a bloody fingerprint. Someone read while bleeding.

3.title: Broken Pen
3.description: A pen snapped in half. Frustration or rage.

3.title: Scattered Notes
3.description: Notes scattered across a desk. The handwriting degrades from neat to frantic.

3.title: Empty Inkwell
3.description: An inkwell scraped completely dry. Someone needed every drop.

3.title: Bookend
3.description: A single bookend. Its partner is missing. The books have fallen.

3.title: Paper Scraps
3.description: Tiny scraps of paper like confetti. Someone tore up a document.

3.title: Wax Seal
3.description: A broken wax seal on the floor. The symbol is a skull.

3.title: Leather Strap
3.description: A strap from a book binding. The book it held is gone.

3.title: Page Corner
3.description: A page corner torn off and dropped. Someone marked their place.

3.title: Magnifying Glass
3.description: A magnifying glass with a cracked lens. For reading small text.

3.title: Book Cart
3.description: A small cart for moving books. One wheel is broken.

3.title: Ladder Rung
3.description: A broken rung from a library ladder. Someone fell.

3.title: Dust Motes
3.description: Dust motes swirl in the air. Someone disturbed the shelves recently.

3.title: Pressed Flower
3.description: A dried flower pressed between book pages. A bookmark from long ago.

3.title: Gnawed Cover
3.description: A book cover gnawed at the corners. Rats? Or something else?

3.title: Spilled Sand
3.description: Sand spilled from a blotter. For drying ink.

3.title: Broken Ruler
3.description: A wooden ruler snapped in two. For measuring or drawing lines.

3.title: Page Weight
3.description: A small weight for holding pages open. Made of brass.

3.title: Ribbon Marker
3.description: A ribbon hanging from a book. The page it marks is about necromancy.

3.title: Cracked Spine
3.description: A book with its spine cracked from being opened too wide. Well-used.

3.title: Margin Notes
3.description: A book with frantic notes scrawled in the margins. 'This works!' 'Try this!'

3.title: Bookplate
3.description: A bookplate inside a cover: 'Property of Belcorra Haruvex.' Her library.

3.title: Moldy Pages
3.description: Pages stuck together with mold. The dampness is destroying the books.

3.title: Torn Illustration
3.description: An illustration torn from a book. It shows a summoning circle.

3.title: Empty Shelf
3.description: A shelf completely empty. The dust outline shows many books were here.

3.title: Reading Stand
3.description: A wooden stand for holding books open. Adjusted to a short person's height.

3.title: Dropped Bookmark
3.description: A bookmark on the floor. Someone lost their place.

3.title: Catalog Card
3.description: A card from a catalog system. This library was organized once.

3.title: Blotter Paper
3.description: Blotter paper covered in ink smudges. Someone wrote many letters here.

3.title: Book Strap
3.description: A leather strap for carrying books. Worn smooth from use.

3.title: Page Knife
3.description: A small knife for cutting pages. The blade is dull from use.

3.title: Wax Drips
3.description: Wax dripped on a book. Someone read by candlelight and wasn't careful.

4.title: Meditation Cushion
4.description: A single cushion, positioned to face one direction. The fabric is stained with old sweat and tears.

4.title: Preserved Hand
4.description: A severed hand in a display case, impossibly well preserved. A trophy of some kind.

4.title: Ghostly Hum
4.description: A faint humming sound, like energy crackling. It's coming from below, but you can't go down. Something blocks the way.

4.title: Distant Moaning
4.description: Faint moaning echoes from somewhere. It sounds... entranced. Dreamy, not pained.

4.title: Rogue's Lockpick
4.description: A lockpick lies next to a skeleton. The pick is bent - they were trying to open something when they died.

4.title: Forgotten Whip
4.description: A whip lies on a table, covered in dust. It hasn't been touched in a very long time.

4.title: Single Leech
4.description: A leech crawls across the floor. Just one. Where did it come from?

4.title: Incense Ash
4.description: A pile of incense ash. The smell is faint but still present. Meditation rituals.

4.title: Broken Icon
4.description: A religious icon smashed on the floor. Someone rejected the gods.

4.title: Silk Scarf
4.description: A silk scarf, expensive and fine. Personal clothing from centuries ago.

4.title: Trophy Plaque
4.description: An empty plaque on the wall. Whatever it displayed is gone.

4.title: Meditation Bell
4.description: A small bell for meditation. It rings with a pure, clear tone.

4.title: Dropped Earring
4.description: A single earring, gold and ornate. Someone lost it here.

4.title: Perfume Bottle
4.description: An empty perfume bottle. The scent is long gone.

4.title: Mirror Shard
4.description: A shard from a broken mirror. The silver backing is intact.

4.title: Hairpin
4.description: An ornate hairpin on the floor. Dropped or torn out?

4.title: Cushion Stuffing
4.description: Stuffing pulled from a cushion. Someone searched it.

4.title: Candle Holder
4.description: An ornate candle holder, tarnished black. Once it was silver.

4.title: Dropped Ring
4.description: A ring on the floor. The stone is missing from its setting.

4.title: Torn Tapestry
4.description: A scrap of tapestry. The pattern shows a battle scene.

4.title: Broken Lute
4.description: A lute with broken strings. Someone played music here once.

4.title: Wine Stain
4.description: An old wine stain on the floor. A bottle was dropped or thrown.

4.title: Dropped Dagger
4.description: A small dagger, ornamental. The blade is dull.

4.title: Powder Compact
4.description: A compact for face powder. The mirror inside is cracked.

4.title: Broken Comb
4.description: A comb with teeth missing. Personal grooming items.

4.title: Spilled Perfume
4.description: A stain where perfume was spilled. The smell is faint but sickly sweet.

4.title: Torn Letter
4.description: A letter torn into pieces. You can make out '...never forgive...'

4.title: Dropped Brooch
4.description: A brooch shaped like a skull. Morbid jewelry.

4.title: Broken Necklace
4.description: A necklace with its chain broken. The beads are scattered.

4.title: Makeup Brush
4.description: A brush for applying makeup. The bristles are stiff with age.

4.title: Dropped Glove
4.description: A single glove, fine leather. Its partner is missing.

4.title: Broken Fan
4.description: A folding fan with broken ribs. Once it was elegant.

4.title: Spilled Ink
4.description: Ink spilled on a writing desk. Someone was writing letters.

4.title: Quill Pen
4.description: A quill pen with a gold nib. Expensive writing tools.

4.title: Wax Seal
4.description: A wax seal stamp. The symbol is a tower.

4.title: Torn Diary
4.description: Pages torn from a diary. The entries are frantic, angry.

4.title: Dropped Key
4.description: A small key on a chain. What does it open?

4.title: Broken Hourglass
4.description: An hourglass with its glass broken. The sand has spilled out.

4.title: Candle Wax
4.description: Wax pooled on a table. Many candles burned here.

4.title: Dropped Coin
4.description: A gold coin. The face shows a ruler you don't recognize.

4.title: Broken Seal
4.description: A broken seal on the floor. Someone opened a sealed letter.

4.title: Torn Ribbon
4.description: A ribbon torn in half. Once it tied something closed.

4.title: Dropped Pendant
4.description: A pendant on a broken chain. The symbol is arcane.

4.title: Broken Bracelet
4.description: A bracelet snapped in two. The metal is bent.

4.title: Spilled Powder
4.description: Face powder spilled on a vanity. The container is tipped over.

4.title: Dropped Vial
4.description: An empty vial. It once held perfume or poison.

4.title: Broken Clasp
4.description: A clasp from a cloak or dress. The pin is bent.

4.title: Torn Fabric
4.description: A scrap of fine fabric. Silk or velvet. From expensive clothing.

4.title: Dropped Button
4.description: A button carved from bone. From an expensive garment.

4.title: Broken Buckle
4.description: A belt buckle, ornate and heavy. The leather is gone.

5.title: Blood-Soaked Sand
5.description: A patch of sand darker than the rest. Old blood, never cleaned.

5.title: Broken Tooth
5.description: A tooth the size of your thumb. Sharp. Not human.

5.title: Claw Mark
5.description: A single claw scratch on the wall. Deep. Whatever made it was huge.

5.title: Dropped Betting Chip
5.description: A clay chip with a number on it. Someone bet on the fights.

5.title: Broken Chain
5.description: A link from a heavy chain. For restraining something strong.

5.title: Spectator's Cushion
5.description: A cushion, moldy and flat. Someone sat here to watch.

5.title: Spilled Wine
5.description: An old wine stain. Aristocrats drank while watching death.

5.title: Beast Fur
5.description: A tuft of coarse fur caught on a cage bar. Black and oily.

5.title: Broken Spear
5.description: A spear shaft snapped in half. The gladiator lost.

5.title: Roar Echo
5.description: Your footstep echoes strangely. Like a distant roar.

5.title: Dropped Shield
5.description: A small buckler, dented and scratched. Abandoned mid-fight.

5.title: Bone Fragment
5.description: A bone fragment on the sand. Humanoid. Picked clean.

5.title: Betting Slip
5.description: A scrap of paper with names and numbers. Betting records.

5.title: Broken Net
5.description: A net torn apart. Whatever was caught broke free.

5.title: Claw Scrape
5.description: Claw marks on the floor. Something tried to dig its way out.

5.title: Dropped Dagger
5.description: A gladiator's dagger, rusted. The blade is notched from use.

5.title: Bloodstain Pattern
5.description: Blood splattered in an arc. Someone was struck hard.

5.title: Broken Helmet
5.description: A helmet crushed flat. The wearer didn't survive.

5.title: Beast Claw
5.description: A severed claw, massive and curved. Trophy or warning?

5.title: Dropped Coin
5.description: A gold coin in the sand. Someone's winnings, lost.

5.title: Cage Bar
5.description: A bent cage bar. Something strong was kept here.

5.title: Torn Banner
5.description: A scrap of banner fabric. A champion's colors.

5.title: Broken Trident
5.description: A trident with one prong snapped off. Arena weapon.

5.title: Spectator's Fan
5.description: A folding fan dropped in the stands. Aristocratic accessory.

5.title: Beast Dung
5.description: Fresh dung. Something large was here recently.

5.title: Broken Whip
5.description: A whip with its lash torn off. For controlling beasts.

5.title: Dropped Gauntlet
5.description: A single gauntlet, leather and metal. Its partner is gone.

5.title: Claw Gouge
5.description: A gouge in the stone wall. Claws scraped here repeatedly.

5.title: Broken Buckle
5.description: A buckle from armor straps. Torn off in combat.

5.title: Bloodied Cloth
5.description: A cloth used to wipe blood. Still damp somehow.

5.title: Dropped Key
5.description: A small key in the sand. For a cage? A chest?

5.title: Broken Collar
5.description: A collar with its chain snapped. A beast broke free.

5.title: Spectator's Glove
5.description: A silk glove dropped in the stands. Fine quality.

5.title: Beast Scale
5.description: A single scale, iridescent and hard. From something reptilian.

5.title: Broken Mace
5.description: A mace with its head cracked. Hit something very hard.

5.title: Dropped Potion
5.description: An empty potion vial. Someone needed healing fast.

5.title: Claw Scratch
5.description: A scratch on the cage door. Counting days? Or madness?

5.title: Broken Sword
5.description: A sword blade snapped at the hilt. The fight was brutal.

5.title: Beast Feather
5.description: A feather as long as your arm. Black and oily.

5.title: Dropped Torch
5.description: A torch burned down to nothing. Someone needed light here.

5.title: Broken Axe
5.description: An axe with its handle splintered. Gladiator weapon.

5.title: Spectator's Ribbon
5.description: A ribbon in champion's colors. Someone's favor.

5.title: Beast Blood
5.description: Blood that's not quite red. Purple-black. Not human.

5.title: Broken Grate
5.description: A grate torn from the floor. Something came up from below.

5.title: Dropped Helmet
5.description: A helmet rolled into a corner. The straps are cut.

5.title: Claw Print
5.description: A claw print in dried blood. Three toes. Huge.

5.title: Broken Lance
5.description: A lance snapped in two. Mounted combat?

5.title: Spectator's Mask
5.description: A decorative mask dropped in the stands. Aristocratic disguise.

5.title: Beast Roar
5.description: A distant roar echoes. Something alive is still here.

5.title: Broken Gate
5.description: A gate hanging off its hinges. The portcullis failed.

6.title: Surgical Tool
6.description: A scalpel on the floor, still sharp. The blade is stained.

6.title: Flesh Scrap
6.description: A scrap of flesh on a table. It twitches when you look away.

6.title: Broken Vial
6.description: A vial shattered on the floor. The liquid ate through the stone.

6.title: Stitching Thread
6.description: Thread used for stitching flesh. It's made of something organic.

6.title: Observation Notes
6.description: A scrap of paper with notes. 'Subject 47: Failed. Dispose.'

6.title: Bloodstain
6.description: A bloodstain on the operating table. Fresh. Very fresh.

6.title: Broken Syringe
6.description: A syringe with its needle bent. The plunger is stuck.

6.title: Flesh Jar
6.description: A jar containing something preserved. You don't look closely.

6.title: Scalpel Set
6.description: A set of scalpels arranged by size. One is missing.

6.title: Dropped Eye
6.description: An eye on the floor. It's not human. It's still looking.

6.title: Stitched Scar
6.description: A piece of skin with stitches. The pattern is deliberate.

6.title: Chemical Smell
6.description: The air smells of preservatives and rot. You gag.

6.title: Broken Restraint
6.description: A leather restraint torn apart. The subject broke free.

6.title: Surgical Mask
6.description: A mask stained with blood. Someone wore this during surgery.

6.title: Flesh Bucket
6.description: A bucket containing scraps. Leftovers from experiments.

6.title: Broken Bone Saw
6.description: A saw with teeth missing. It cut through many bones.

6.title: Observation Window
6.description: A window looking into a chamber. The glass is smeared.

6.title: Dropped Organ
6.description: Something organic on the floor. You step around it quickly.

6.title: Stitching Pattern
6.description: A pattern drawn on paper. Instructions for stitching flesh.

6.title: Broken Clamp
6.description: A surgical clamp bent out of shape. It held something struggling.

6.title: Flesh Sample
6.description: A sample in a dish. It's growing something.

6.title: Dropped Needle
6.description: A needle the size of a dagger. For stitching large subjects.

6.title: Chemical Burn
6.description: A burn mark on the table. Acid or something worse.

6.title: Broken Jar
6.description: A jar shattered on the floor. Whatever was inside is gone.

6.title: Surgical Apron
6.description: An apron hanging on a hook. Stiff with dried blood.

6.title: Flesh Mold
6.description: A mold for shaping flesh. The shape is disturbing.

6.title: Broken Forceps
6.description: Forceps bent and twisted. They gripped something too hard.

6.title: Observation Log
6.description: A log book open on a desk. The last entry: 'Screaming stopped.'

6.title: Dropped Tooth
6.description: A tooth on the floor. It's been filed to a point.

6.title: Flesh Graft
6.description: A piece of skin grafted onto something. The colors don't match.

6.title: Broken Microscope
6.description: A microscope with cracked lenses. For examining specimens.

6.title: Chemical Spill
6.description: A spill on the floor. The stone is bubbling.

6.title: Dropped Scalpel
6.description: A scalpel still wet with blood. Recently used.

6.title: Flesh Diagram
6.description: A diagram showing how to rearrange organs. Horrifying.

6.title: Broken Beaker
6.description: A beaker shattered on the floor. The liquid is eating the stone.

6.title: Surgical Tray
6.description: A tray of tools arranged neatly. Ready for the next subject.

6.title: Dropped Finger
6.description: A finger on the floor. It has too many joints.

6.title: Flesh Vat
6.description: A vat containing something. It bubbles slowly.

6.title: Broken Retractor
6.description: A retractor bent out of shape. It held flesh open.

6.title: Observation Chair
6.description: A chair facing an operating table. Someone watched from here.

6.title: Dropped Syringe
6.description: A syringe with green liquid inside. You don't touch it.

6.title: Flesh Sketch
6.description: A sketch of a creature. Half-drawn, half-real.

6.title: Broken Lamp
6.description: A surgical lamp with its bulb shattered. For illuminating work.

6.title: Chemical Bottle
6.description: A bottle labeled in a language you don't know. The contents glow.

6.title: Dropped Clamp
6.description: A clamp for holding flesh. The jaws are bent.

6.title: Flesh Puppet
6.description: Something that looks like a doll. Made of flesh. It moves.

6.title: Broken Table
6.description: An operating table with one leg broken. Someone heavy was here.

6.title: Surgical Notes
6.description: Notes in cramped handwriting. 'Try adding more limbs next time.'

6.title: Dropped Probe
6.description: A probe for examining wounds. The tip is bloody.

6.title: Flesh Cage
6.description: A cage made of bone and sinew. Empty now. What was inside?

7.title: Brimstone Smell
7.description: The air smells of sulfur. Your eyes water.

7.title: Scorch Mark
7.description: A scorch mark on the wall. The shape is vaguely humanoid.

7.title: Broken Chain
7.description: A chain link melted through. The heat was intense.

7.title: Contract Scrap
7.description: A scrap of parchment with tiny writing. Legal language.

7.title: Dropped Coin
7.description: A coin that's too hot to touch. It glows faintly red.

7.title: Claw Scratch
7.description: A claw mark on the cell door. Deep and deliberate.

7.title: Melted Lock
7.description: A lock melted into slag. Someone wanted out badly.

7.title: Bloodstain
7.description: A bloodstain on the floor. It's still warm.

7.title: Broken Shackle
7.description: A shackle snapped open. The metal is twisted.

7.title: Distant Scream
7.description: A scream echoes from somewhere. It stops abruptly.

7.title: Dropped Quill
7.description: A quill pen with red ink. Or is it blood?

7.title: Wax Seal
7.description: A broken wax seal. The symbol is a pitchfork.

7.title: Charred Bone
7.description: A bone charred black. The marrow is gone.

7.title: Cell Tally
7.description: Tally marks scratched into a cell wall. Hundreds of them.

7.title: Dropped Key
7.description: A key that's too hot to hold. It glows with inner heat.

7.title: Broken Collar
7.description: A collar with spikes on the inside. For controlling prisoners.

7.title: Contract Fragment
7.description: A fragment of a contract. You can read: '...in perpetuity...'

7.title: Melted Candle
7.description: A candle melted into a puddle. The heat here is constant.

7.title: Claw Print
7.description: A claw print burned into the floor. Still smoking.

7.title: Broken Whip
7.description: A whip with barbs on the lash. For punishment.

7.title: Dropped Tooth
7.description: A tooth on the floor. Sharp and pointed. Not human.

7.title: Scorch Pattern
7.description: Scorch marks in a pattern. A summoning circle?

7.title: Broken Grate
7.description: A grate torn from the floor. Something came up from below.

7.title: Contract Ash
7.description: Ashes of a burned contract. Someone voided their deal.

7.title: Melted Shackle
7.description: A shackle melted around a wrist bone. The prisoner died here.

7.title: Dropped Horn
7.description: A horn fragment. Curved and ridged. From a devil's head.

7.title: Cell Door
7.description: A cell door hanging open. The lock is intact. Opened from inside.

7.title: Broken Rack
7.description: A torture rack with one wheel broken. It saw heavy use.

7.title: Dropped Seal
7.description: A seal stamp for contracts. The symbol is a skull.

7.title: Charred Cloth
7.description: Cloth burned to ash. The outline shows it was clothing.

7.title: Cell Scratch
7.description: Words scratched into a cell: 'I didn't read it all.'

7.title: Broken Brand
7.description: A branding iron snapped in half. For marking prisoners.

7.title: Dropped Scale
7.description: A scale from devil skin. Red and hot to the touch.

7.title: Melted Coin
7.description: A coin melted into the floor. The face is unrecognizable.

7.title: Contract Pile
7.description: A pile of contracts stacked neatly. All signed in blood.

7.title: Broken Cage
7.description: A cage with bars bent outward. Something strong escaped.

7.title: Dropped Claw
7.description: A severed claw. Still twitching.

7.title: Scorch Handprint
7.description: A handprint burned into the wall. The fingers are too long.

7.title: Cell Prayer
7.description: A prayer scratched into a cell wall. It didn't work.

7.title: Broken Thumbscrew
7.description: A thumbscrew with its screw stripped. Overused.

7.title: Dropped Ink
7.description: Spilled ink on a desk. Someone was writing contracts.

7.title: Melted Ring
7.description: A ring melted onto a finger bone. Wedding band?

7.title: Contract Signature
7.description: A signature on a contract scrap. The name is yours.

7.title: Broken Iron Maiden
7.description: An iron maiden with its door torn off. Empty now.

7.title: Dropped Feather
7.description: A feather that's on fire. It doesn't burn up.

7.title: Cell Bloodstain
7.description: Blood on the cell wall. Handprints sliding down.

7.title: Broken Pitchfork
7.description: A pitchfork with bent tines. Devil's weapon.

7.title: Dropped Parchment
7.description: A blank contract on the floor. Waiting for a signature.

7.title: Melted Bars
7.description: Cell bars melted and re-solidified. The heat was extreme.

7.title: Contract Loophole
7.description: A contract with a note: 'Found the loophole!' They didn't.

8.title: Glowing Mushroom
8.description: A mushroom glowing faintly blue. It pulses like a heartbeat.

8.title: Wet Footprint
8.description: A footprint in the mud. Humanoid but wrong. The toes are too long.

8.title: Psychic Whisper
8.description: A whisper at the edge of hearing. You can't make out the words.

8.title: Mushroom Spore
8.description: Spores drift through the air. They make you dizzy.

8.title: Bog Stench
8.description: The smell of rot and stagnant water. You gag.

8.title: Dropped Tool
8.description: A farming tool, rusted and ancient. For tending mushrooms.

8.title: Wet Cloth
8.description: A cloth soaked in bog water. It's been here a long time.

8.title: Mushroom Circle
8.description: Mushrooms growing in a perfect circle. Deliberate cultivation.

8.title: Psychic Echo
8.description: You hear your own thoughts echoed back. Distorted.

8.title: Bog Mummy Hand
8.description: A hand reaching from the mud. Preserved. Grasping.

8.title: Glowing Pool
8.description: A pool of water glowing faintly. Bioluminescent algae.

8.title: Dropped Basket
8.description: A basket for harvesting mushrooms. Rotted through.

8.title: Psychic Pressure
8.description: Pressure behind your eyes. Something is watching.

8.title: Mushroom Stalk
8.description: A mushroom stalk as thick as your arm. Cut cleanly.

8.title: Bog Bubble
8.description: Bubbles rising from the mud. The smell is overwhelming.

8.title: Dropped Sickle
8.description: A sickle for harvesting. The blade is pitted with rust.

8.title: Wet Bones
8.description: Bones half-submerged in mud. Preserved by the bog.

8.title: Mushroom Smell
8.description: The smell of mushrooms. Earthy and overwhelming.

8.title: Psychic Headache
8.description: A sudden headache. It fades when you move away.

8.title: Bog Mummy Cloth
8.description: A strip of cloth, preserved and leathery. From a mummy.

8.title: Glowing Moss
8.description: Moss glowing on the walls. It lights your way.

8.title: Dropped Hoe
8.description: A hoe for tending soil. The handle is rotted.

8.title: Psychic Voice
8.description: A voice in your head. Not yours. It says: 'Serve.'

8.title: Mushroom Patch
8.description: A patch of mushrooms growing on a corpse. Feeding.

8.title: Bog Water
8.description: Water dripping from the ceiling. Brown and thick.

8.title: Dropped Rake
8.description: A rake for tending mushroom beds. The tines are bent.

8.title: Wet Footsteps
8.description: Wet footprints leading away. They don't dry.

8.title: Mushroom Cap
8.description: A mushroom cap the size of a shield. Harvested.

8.title: Psychic Dread
8.description: A feeling of dread washes over you. No source.

8.title: Bog Mummy Face
8.description: A face in the mud. Eyes open. Staring.

8.title: Glowing Fungus
8.description: Fungus growing in patterns. Almost like writing.

8.title: Dropped Bucket
8.description: A bucket for carrying water. Full of bog water.

8.title: Psychic Laughter
8.description: Laughter in your mind. Mocking. Not your own.

8.title: Mushroom Spore Cloud
8.description: A cloud of spores. You hold your breath.

8.title: Bog Stain
8.description: A stain on the wall. Bog water seeping through.

8.title: Dropped Trowel
8.description: A trowel for planting. The blade is rusted solid.

8.title: Wet Hair
8.description: Hair caught on a stone. Long and preserved. Bog mummy.

8.title: Mushroom Root
8.description: A mushroom root system exposed. It spreads everywhere.

8.title: Psychic Scream
8.description: A scream in your mind. Silent but deafening.

8.title: Bog Mummy Finger
8.description: A finger on the ground. Preserved. Still wearing a ring.

8.title: Glowing Trail
8.description: A trail of glowing mushrooms. Leading somewhere.

8.title: Dropped Shovel
8.description: A shovel stuck in the mud. The handle is rotted.

8.title: Psychic Command
8.description: A command in your mind: 'Worship.' You resist.

8.title: Mushroom Harvest
8.description: Mushrooms cut and piled. Recently harvested.

8.title: Bog Skeleton
8.description: A skeleton half-submerged. The bones are stained brown.

8.title: Dropped Knife
8.description: A knife for cutting mushrooms. The blade is sharp.

8.title: Wet Clothing
8.description: Clothing hanging on a hook. Soaked and moldy.

8.title: Mushroom Smell
8.description: The smell intensifies. You're near the main farm.

8.title: Psychic Presence
8.description: You feel watched. The feeling doesn't go away.

8.title: Bog Mummy Tooth
8.description: A tooth on the ground. Filed to a point. Deliberately.

9.title: Drow Bootprint
9.description: A bootprint in the dust. Drow make. Recent.

9.title: Urdefhan Tooth
9.description: A tooth on the ground. Sharp and yellowed. Urdefhan.

9.title: Darklands Fungus
9.description: A fungus you don't recognize. Darklands species.

9.title: Dropped Arrow
9.description: A drow arrow. The fletching is black feathers.

9.title: Blood Trail
9.description: A trail of blood leading into darkness. Fresh.

9.title: Lens Glint
9.description: A glint of colored light. Like a lens reflecting.

9.title: Caligni Shadow
9.description: A shadow that moves wrong. Caligni were here.

9.title: Urdefhan Banner
9.description: A scrap of banner. War champion's colors.

9.title: Drow Carving
9.description: A carving in the wall. Drow script. A warning.

9.title: Dropped Dagger
9.description: A dagger with a curved blade. Darklands make.

9.title: Refugee Cloth
9.description: A scrap of cloth. Caligni weave. Torn.

9.title: Urdefhan Warpaint
9.description: Warpaint smeared on a rock. Still wet.

9.title: Drow Rope
9.description: A rope made of spider silk. Drow craftsmanship.

9.title: Lens Fragment
9.description: A tiny shard of colored crystal. From a lens?

9.title: Caligni Whisper
9.description: A whisper in the shadows. You can't see the speaker.

9.title: Urdefhan Bone
9.description: A bone carved with symbols. Urdefhan trophy.

9.title: Drow Poison
9.description: A vial of poison. Drow make. The stopper is loose.

9.title: Dropped Spear
9.description: A spear with a stone tip. Urdefhan weapon.

9.title: Darklands Moss
9.description: Moss glowing faintly. Darklands species.

9.title: Caligni Footprint
9.description: A footprint that's too light. Caligni barely touch the ground.

9.title: Urdefhan Camp
9.description: Ashes from a fire. Urdefhan camped here recently.

9.title: Drow Cloak
9.description: A scrap of cloak. Drow weave. Torn in combat.

9.title: Lens Glow
9.description: A faint glow from somewhere. Colored light.

9.title: Caligni Charm
9.description: A charm made of shadow. It dissolves when you touch it.

9.title: Urdefhan Skull
9.description: A skull with filed teeth. Urdefhan trophy.

9.title: Drow Crossbow Bolt
9.description: A bolt from a hand crossbow. Drow make.

9.title: Dropped Shield
9.description: A shield with urdefhan symbols. Dropped in flight.

9.title: Darklands Beetle
9.description: A beetle the size of your fist. Darklands species.

9.title: Caligni Mask
9.description: A mask made of shadow-stuff. It fades in the light.

9.title: Urdefhan Drum
9.description: A war drum. The skin is stretched tight.

9.title: Drow Ration
9.description: A ration pack. Drow food. Dried mushrooms.

9.title: Lens Reflection
9.description: A reflection of colored light on the wall. Moving.

9.title: Caligni Prayer
9.description: Words scratched in the dark. A prayer to the Forsaken.

9.title: Urdefhan Axe
9.description: An axe with a chipped blade. Urdefhan weapon.

9.title: Drow Trap
9.description: A tripwire across the path. Drow trap. Disarmed.

9.title: Dropped Torch
9.description: A torch made of fungus. Darklands light source.

9.title: Darklands Spider
9.description: A spider the size of a dog. Dead. Something killed it.

9.title: Caligni Tears
9.description: Dark stains on the ground. Caligni tears. They weep shadow.

9.title: Urdefhan Blood
9.description: Blood on the ground. Dark and thick. Urdefhan.

9.title: Drow Sigil
9.description: A sigil carved into stone. Drow house mark.

9.title: Lens Hum
9.description: A humming sound. Like crystal vibrating.

9.title: Caligni Refuge
9.description: A small shelter. Caligni made. Abandoned.

9.title: Urdefhan Horn
9.description: A war horn. Urdefhan make. Cracked.

9.title: Drow Whittling
9.description: Wood shavings on the ground. Someone was whittling.

9.title: Dropped Lens
9.description: A small lens on the ground. Not a fulcrum lens. For seeing.

9.title: Darklands Bat
9.description: A bat with no eyes. Darklands species.

9.title: Caligni Offering
9.description: An offering to the Forsaken. Shadow and bone.

9.title: Urdefhan Scar
9.description: A scar pattern carved into stone. Urdefhan ritual.

9.title: Drow Lockpick
9.description: A lockpick set. Drow make. One pick is missing.

9.title: Lens Power
9.description: The air feels charged. A lens is nearby.

10.title: Seven Fingers
10.description: A handprint on the wall. Seven fingers. Wrong.

10.title: Reality Ripple
10.description: The air ripples like water. Reality feels thin here.

10.title: Serpent Scale
10.description: A scale on the ground. Serpentfolk. Ancient.

10.title: Empty Whisper
10.description: A whisper that says nothing. You hear it anyway.

10.title: Warped Stone
10.description: Stone that's been twisted. Not carved. Warped.

10.title: Serpent Carving
10.description: A carving of a serpent. The eyes follow you.

10.title: Void Stain
10.description: A stain that's darker than black. It hurts to look at.

10.title: Reality Crack
10.description: A crack in the air. You can see through to... nothing.

10.title: Serpent Fang
10.description: A fang the length of your finger. Serpentfolk.

10.title: Empty Echo
10.description: Your voice echoes. But the echo is empty. Silent.

10.title: Warped Time
10.description: You blink. Hours have passed. Or seconds. You can't tell.

10.title: Serpent Script
10.description: Writing in serpent script. The words shift when you read them.

10.title: Void Touch
10.description: A spot on the wall that's cold. Colder than ice. Empty cold.

10.title: Reality Fold
10.description: The corridor folds in on itself. You're walking in circles.

10.title: Serpent Statue
10.description: A statue of a serpent. It's breathing.

10.title: Empty Hunger
10.description: A feeling of hunger. Not yours. Something else's.

10.title: Warped Gravity
10.description: Gravity shifts. You stumble. The floor is now the wall.

10.title: Serpent Skin
10.description: Shed skin on the ground. Serpentfolk. Still warm.

10.title: Void Presence
10.description: Something is here. You can't see it. It's made of nothing.

10.title: Reality Tear
10.description: A tear in space. You see through to somewhere else. Somewhere wrong.

10.title: Serpent Altar
10.description: An altar carved with serpents. The stone is slick with blood.

10.title: Empty Scream
10.description: A scream with no sound. You hear it in your bones.

10.title: Warped Light
10.description: Light bends around a corner. Physics don't work here.

10.title: Serpent Eye
10.description: An eye carved into the wall. It blinks.

10.title: Void Footprint
10.description: A footprint that's not there. You see the absence of it.

10.title: Reality Loop
10.description: You've been here before. Just now. You're looping.

10.title: Serpent Offering
10.description: An offering bowl. Full of something that writhes.

10.title: Empty Touch
10.description: Something touches you. There's nothing there.

10.title: Warped Sound
10.description: Sound travels wrong. You hear your heartbeat from across the room.

10.title: Serpent Priest
10.description: A skeleton in priest robes. Serpentfolk. Clutching a symbol.

10.title: Void Stare
10.description: You feel watched by nothing. The void is looking at you.

10.title: Reality Shift
10.description: The room shifts. The door is now where the wall was.

10.title: Serpent Coil
10.description: A coil pattern carved into the floor. For summoning.

10.title: Empty Breath
10.description: A breath on your neck. There's no one behind you.

10.title: Warped Distance
10.description: The far wall is close. And far. Both at once.

10.title: Serpent Fang Necklace
10.description: A necklace of serpent fangs. Still dripping venom.

10.title: Void Hunger
10.description: A hunger that's not hunger. The void wants to consume.

10.title: Reality Fracture
10.description: Reality fractures. You see multiple versions of yourself.

10.title: Serpent Mural
10.description: A mural of serpents worshipping something. Seven-fingered.

10.title: Empty Promise
10.description: A promise whispered. To give you nothing. Forever.

10.title: Warped Memory
10.description: You remember being here. You've never been here.

10.title: Serpent Skull
10.description: A serpentfolk skull. The jaw is unhinged. Screaming.

10.title: Void Gate
10.description: A doorway to nothing. You can step through. You don't.

10.title: Reality Collapse
10.description: Reality collapses for a moment. Everything is nothing. Then it's back.

10.title: Serpent Ritual
10.description: Ritual implements scattered. The ceremony was interrupted.

10.title: Empty Soul
10.description: You feel empty. Like your soul is being drained. It passes.

10.title: Warped Reflection
10.description: Your reflection moves wrong. It's not copying you.

10.title: Serpent Crown
10.description: A crown shaped like a serpent. For a priest-king.

10.title: Void Call
10.description: The void calls to you. Promising oblivion. Peace. Nothing.

10.title: Reality End
10.description: You reach the end of reality. There's a wall. Beyond it: nothing.
